Hi! My name is Pranay (pronounced Pruh-na-ey), I am currently a Doctoral Candidate supervised by Prof. Dr. Els Lefever at the Language and Translation Technology Team (LT3), UGent. My primary areas of interest include Cross-Lingual Supervision, Low-Resource NLP, Transfer Learning and Interpretability.
I have previously worked in the R&D Team of retail AI startup Paralleldots, before which I was a student at BITS Pilani, Goa.
In my free time I enjoy listening to progressive music, reading fantasy and I occasionally dabble with writing.
